front.title: RSVP-TE Extensions For Signaling GMPLS Restoration LSP

abstract.t: Generalized Multi-Protocol Label Switching (GMPLS) RSVP-TE recovery signaling extensions are specified in [RFC4872] and [RFC4873]. In transport networks, there are requirements where GMPLS recovery scheme need to employ restoration LSP while keeping resources for the working and/ or protecting LSPs reserved in the network. Currently GMPLS recovery procedures do not address these requirements. This document proposes RSVP-TE extensions for GMPLS recovery with restoration LSP.
